lines.text: Gentlemen, this is becoming ridiculous! The next thing you know, someone will be accusing you of being Zorro.
Why, I believe I'd be flattered!
What Diego can't do, Zorro can!
I propose that Kala be hanged in the public square tomorrow morning.
Excellent - make an example of him!
I also agree. Show the Yaquis they cannot break our laws and live and we'll have little to fear from that quarter.
